-50,250,240,200,20,1;  240,200,280,220,5,1;  280,220,300,260,5,1;  300,260,280,300,5,-1;  280,300,240,320,5,-1;  240,320,200,300,5,-1;  200,300,180,260,5,-1;  180,260,200,220,5,1;  200,220,240,200,5,1;  240,200,530,150,20,1;;;
530,400,240,350,20,-1;  240,350,200,330,5,-1;  200,330,180,290,5,-1;  180,290,200,250,5,1;  200,250,240,230,5,1;  240,230,280,250,5,1;  280,250,300,290,5,1;  300,290,280,330,5,-1;  280,330,240,350,5,-1;  240,350,-50,300,20,-1;;;
-50,600,190,500,40,1;  190,500,190,450,20,0;  190,450,140,400,20,-1;  140,400,140,350,20,0;  140,350,190,300,20,1;  190,300,190,250,20,0;  190,250,-50,150,40,-1;;;
-50,300,100,350,25,1;  100,350,150,400,9,1;  150,400,200,400,9,1;  200,400,250,350,9,1;  250,350,300,350,9,1;  300,350,350,300,9,1;  350,300,350,250,9,0;  350,250,300,200,9,-1;  300,200,250,200,9,-1;  250,200,200,250,9,-1;  200,250,150,250,9,-1;  150,250,-50,200,25,-1;;;
240,-50,240,900,800,0;;;
-50,0,150,50,15,1;  150,50,50,100,15,-1;  50,100,150,150,15,1;  150,150,50,200,15,-1;  50,200,150,250,15,1;  150,250,50,300,15,-1;  50,300,150,350,15,1;  150,350,50,400,15,-1;  50,400,150,450,15,1;  150,450,50,500,15,-1;  50,500,150,550,15,1;  150,550,50,600,15,-1;  50,600,150,650,15,1;  150,650,50,700,15,-1;  50,700,150,750,15,1;  150,750,50,800,15,-1;  50,800,150,850,15,1;  150,850,50,900,15,-1;;;





//  <-- Trennzeichen für den Code

Weg der Gegner
x_start, y_start, x_end, y_end, Frames, ModelArt [-1 = left] [0 = normal] [1 = right]

Es wird immer der komplette Weg in ein Listenelement geladen und dann komplett abgefragt
